name: Asteroid Evaders
description:
Shoot asteroids and rack up points!

Normal asteroids take 1 shot to destroy, give 1 point, and take 1 health away from you.

Green asteroids take 3 shots to destroy, give 5 points per shot, and take 1 health away from you.

Controls: 

Move Left: W or Left Arrow

Move Right: A or Right Arrow

Shoot: Spacebar

Careful, the green asteroids also reflect your shots back at you! Don't spam space too much!
